rows.label: bf04120140_0010
rows.name:
If the information is correct,
he should be here, right?

rows.label: bf04120140_0020
rows.name:
To think they're using Uncle Umon's
shipyard as their hideout...

rows.label: bf04120140_0030
rows.name: I never would have thought of that, mo.

rows.label: bf04120140_0040
rows.name:
That's him. Let's surround
them so he can't run.

rows.label: bf04120140_0070
rows.name: Hey, you sure ran far, didn't you?

rows.label: bf04120140_0080
rows.name:
Thanks to you, our plans
are all messed up now.

rows.label: bf04120140_0100
rows.name:
You guys are still just kids, right?
Won't you return what you stole?

rows.label: bf04120140_0110
rows.name: I don't want to hurt children.

rows.label: bf04120140_0130
rows.name:
Even so, I'm technically a
working adult, you know?

rows.label: bf04120140_0160
rows.name: The Core Crystal belongs to us now!

rows.label: bf04120140_0170
rows.name:
If you really want it, try
taking it back by force!

rows.label: bf04120140_0180
rows.name:
Unreasonable guys... Can't be
helped. Time for punishment!
